newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan plans to auction 10,000 T basmati rice.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan plans to auction 10,000 T basmati rice.

text.p: The state-run Rice Export Corporation of Pakistan (RECP) is likely to auction 10,000 tonnes of 1995/96 (July-June) basmati rice next week for export, dealers said on Wednesday.
"The Corporation plans to invite tenders for the auction next week," one dealer said.
The RECP sold 10,000 tonnes of basmati rice at $433 per tonne FOB for export last month, the dealer said. New crop basmati will reach the market from farms next month, he added.
